roleset.name: to (cause to) convert into an oxide, combine with oxygen

role.descr: cause of oxidizing, scientist causing conversion
entity, element being converted into an oxide, thing oxidizing

example.name: Patient only
example.text: It-1 will lose the whitening effect *PRO*-1 once oxidized *-1.

example.name: All Arguments, what manner is that?
example.src: All Arguments, what manner is that?
example.type: All Arguments, what manner is that?
example.text: The jeweler oxidized it in the same manner the case from the early movies was oxidized.
example.arg: in the same manner the case from the early movies was oxidized

example.text: I have read relevant information that L-Ascorbic acid oxidizes easily after it dissolves in the water.
example.arg: after it dissolves in the water
